Pandimensional Pack Alpaca

5 HP, headbutt (d4)

• If cornered Tufted alpaca loaded with some exotic goods from the Living Stars, as well as a beeping gadget.

• Pops out of nowhere in the most inopportune moment (even during another encounter), runs around, screams, panics and pops out of existence in about a minute.

• On Critical Damage, it explodes dealing d10 Blast damage and destroying whatever it carries.

category: monsters source: discord
